Metadata.description: Web development for businesses and startups: from landing pages to online stores, including mobile applications. Quality, speed, and individual approach in every project. I will make your website functional and attractive to users!

Hero.title: I'm Yulia, and I'm a web developer from Lviv ü•∞

description.part2: For 2 years I worked in project employment in Ukrainian IT companies as a Frontend Developer. During this time, I gained valuable experience creating various web applications. I have implemented many impressive and successful projects, from landing pages to complex online stores.
description.part3: My main focus is on developing on Next.js, React, and React Native frameworks, which allows me to create powerful and modern websites with high performance and speed.In addition, I specialize in developing websites using Nunjucks and Tailwind, which provides more flexibility in design and allows customers to easily make changes to the content

Service.title: Services
Service.description: Here you can familiarize yourself with the wide range of services I provide. Discover the variety of opportunities offered in the field of programming and web design
